SAINT.Name: Afterfeast of the Meeting of the Lord
Holy and Righteous Simeon the God-Receiver and Anna the Prophetess (1st C)
[The service to Sts Simeon and Anna is transfered to Monday. The service to St Nicholas of Japan is chanted today.]
Right-believing Great Prince Sviatoslav, in baptism Gabriel
Holy Hierarch Ansgar, Archbishop of Bremen and Hamburg, Enlightener of Denmark and the North (+865)
Holy Equal-to-the-Apostles Nicholas, Archbishop and Enlightener of Japan (+1912)
Holy Equal-to-the-Apostles Innocent, Metropolitan of Moscow, Enlightener of Alaska
